name: GMTK2022 Roll of the Dice
description:
GMTK2022 Roll of the Dice Puzzle Game

Welcome to our submission for GMTK2022! We present to you a relaxing puzzle game with an equally relaxing soundtrack.

How to Play:
Roll around and try to match the top face of the player dice to the dice face on the ground to complete a level. Progress though 8 levels of increasing difficulty.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Escape - Exit

Sources:
